item.title: MRK
item.description: score:227 Chances: Merck & Co., Inc. is a well-established company with a strong presence in the healthcare sector, offering a wide range of prescription medicines, vaccines, biologic therapies, and consumer care products. The company has a diversified business model with segments in pharmaceuticals, animal health, and other healthcare services, providing multiple revenue streams.
